metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28216 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
BootPerformanceTable pointer is read from an NVRAM variable in PEI. Recommend setting PcdFirmwarePerformanceDataTableS3Support to FALSE.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

efi-shell-aa64 - 2021.11-1
efi-shell-arm - 2021.11-1
efi-shell-ia32 - 2021.11-1
efi-shell-x64 - 2021.11-1
ovmf - 2021.11-1
ovmf-ia32 - 2021.11-1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2021.11-1
qemu-efi-arm - 2021.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2021.11-1').
